com.github.detro.browsermobproxyclient

Class BMPCLocalLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.detro.browsermobproxyclient.BMPCLocalLauncher

  • public class BMPCLocalLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that takes care of Installing/Uninstalling Local Browser Mob Proxy as well as Starting and Stopping it.

    "Local" means that it's located inside the Current User directory, inside .browsermob-proxy-client/browsermob-proxy-local.

    Using the "Local installation", this class can launch multiple "Managers". Precisely, the various running BrowserMob Proxies are represented by BMPCLocalManager.

    Those instances are started when created, but it's left to the client code to deal with cleanup.

    A version of BrowserMob Proxy is contained within the resources of this library. This class takes care of installing/uninstalling (zip/delete) it.

      • launch

        public static BMPCLocalManager launch(int port)
        Launch Local BrowserMob Proxy and return a BMPCManager to handle it. It will also install it if not installed yet.
        Parameters:
        port - Port to bind Local BrowserMob Proxy to
        Returns:
        Instance of BMPCManager

      • isInstalled

        public static boolean isInstalled()
        Is a Local instance of BrowserMob Proxy installed?
        Returns:
        Returns "true" if a Local BrowserMob Proxy is installed, "false" otherwise.

      • install

      • installedVersion

        public static java.lang.String installedVersion()
        Installed version of Local BrowserMob Proxy
        Returns:
        Version of Local BrowserMob Proxy, if installed. Throws @see BMPCLocalLauncherNotInstallerException if not installed. Please use BMPCLocalLauncher#isInstalled() to check first.
